faqs.question: What documentation is required when I decide to buy house in Sector 76
faqs.answer: When purchasing a property, standard documentation includes the Sale Deed or Conveyance Deed, which confirms ownership transfer. You will also need the Khata Certificate, which verifies the property is listed under local municipal records. If purchasing a resale house, ensure you receive the Occupancy Certificate and all previous chain documents. For new projects, the RERA registration number and approved building plans are mandatory for due diligence.
